message.body: Hey we are having a bit of a gathering if you and Julian want to come over later
Awesome! Julian and I are at blue sage in the burbs, but maybe when we get back into the city! :)
Yeah! We are gonna grill some food in a bit and I think maybe michael and Liz will come over later. Zack is here too. I'm already drunk as a skunk
Haha watch out! Who's zack?
He used to live here. He's really nice
Just heading back to Philly now and so full and tired! Probably gonna go home and chill. Let's hang this week though!
Sounds good! I'll text you this week.
OMG there are so many people here
I just had to retreat.
Haha omg who's there??
A bunch of people I don't know!
Haha oh no! Stay in your room!
Did you get drunk?
Someone just lit like 30 fireworks In the backyard and I was like, I'm out.
Frankie and I are gonna watch Netflix.
Look out your window
Julian and I are smoking
Feels right
You guys look cool!
Smoking makes people look cool
It's so true
I just went to go pee and there was a 20 year old girl with blue hair in the bathroom
I'm gonna walk downstairs in my underwear and make a scene
Atleast she wasn't doing cocaine.
You should also start randomly making out with everyone...go all out
#bodyshots
Yeah I'm gonna like wander down stairs in my silk robe all open and start hitting on people.
And make a sandwich.
Perfect. Just make sure you put lots of meats and cheeses on it.
Just meat and cheese piles.
I'm gonna load up the mayonnaise in the middle if the party. The girl with the blue hair is gonna vomit.
Make sure your bedroom door is locked...don't want her getting confused and puking on your floor.
